A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just saw it for the first time. Still processing but as of now loved the beginning\, liked the ending but the middle is a mixed bag. A lot of the Fin and Rose stuff will be skipped when watching the future Blu-ray. Will definitely be watching it again! (after second viewing I dropped my score to 3 stars due to not getting my awesome Luke moment. I'm a little bitter about it. Luke was my favorite growing up)
